maltcms.commands.distances.dtw
Interface IDynamicTimeWarp

All Superinterfaces:
ICommand<Tuple2D<Array[],Array[]>,Array[]>, IConfigurable, IWorkflowElement, IXMLSerializable, ListDistanceFunction
All Known Implementing Classes:
ADynamicTimeWarp, MZIDynamicTimeWarp, ScanlineFilterTicWarp, ScanlineHorizontalTicWarp, ScanlineMaxMSWarp, ScanlineMeanMSWarp, ScanlineTicWarp, TICDynamicTimeWarp
public interface IDynamicTimeWarp
extends ListDistanceFunction

Refinement of ListDistanceFunction, adding necessary methods for alignment with DTW.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
